My name is Vladimir Fokow.
I am a bachelor's student at KPI University 🇺🇦 studying Information systems and technologies, 2020-2024.
My strong interests are in A.I., Data Science, and Robotics.
Typing speed:
What makes a QUANTUM COMPUTER Fundamentally More POWERFUL? | Arvin Ash
Decoded: How Does a Quantum Computer Work?
Quantum computers and their applications | Fraunhofer-Institut
[Interview clip] Scott Aaronson: What is a Quantum Computer? | Lex Fridman
🤩 The Mathematics of Quantum Computers | Infinite Series
[Optional] Hacking at Quantum Speed with Shor's Algorithm | Infinite Series
Quantum Computing for Computer Scientists | Microsoft Research

l: Practical programming (using IBM's cloud quantum computers)
p: Sentdex has a great educational playlist (3 videos): Quantum Computer Programming w/ Qiskit | sentdex
best 10 mins - Entropy, Cross-Entropy and KL-Divergence
Excellent explanaiton of binary vs categorical cross-entropy:
https://datascience.stackexchange.com/q/9302/136526
some intuition about KL-divergence (not very robust)
https://towardsdatascience.com/cross-entropy-loss-function-f38c4ec8643e
Animation in Jupyter Notebooks (with matplotlib / seaborn): https://jckantor.github.io/CBE30338/A.03-Animation-in-Jupyter-Notebooks.html
Matplotlib 3d plots + Python for Data Science HANDBOOK: https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/04.12-three-dimensional-plotting.html
Git explanation: ProGit book.
Funny Git help: https://ohshitgit.com
